name: Markets & Money Today | 2 Min News | The Daily News Now!

episodes.title: From Cult to Chess Champion: The Danny Rensch Story
episodes.description: From cult survivor to chess champion to tech mogul! Discover how Danny Rensch, co-founder of Chess.com, escaped a childhood in a cult to build a 225-million-member online chess empire. Learn how chess became his lifeline, his rise to national master, and the against-all-odds story of bootstrapping Chess.com into a global phenomenon without venture capital, fueled by passion and The Queen's Gambit. Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
